item.description:
A great night of fashion, music and drinks!

We will meet at Alibi between 8:30 and 9pm and grab a few drinks before it gets crowded and then head upstairs. Trust me, this place gets packed early and you don't want to be left out in the cold! The fashion show starts about 10pm.


Event details-
Join Luba Gorelik for a night of fashion and music featuring:

Clothing by: Lit Boutique
Sounds by: Michael Savant

Complimentary Admission


I'll send contact details to RSVPs on Thursday :-) Email me if you have any questions!
item.name: Fashionably LATE at the Liberty Hotel
